block.name: FS20 Frame Decoder
block.doc:
FS20 frame decoder: this block decodes FS20 frames from FS20 databits (output of "FS20 bit decoder") and outputs FS20 packetbytes as messages.
The decoder checks and removes the parity bits after each 8 databits, validate the bit checksum over all databytes and remove the checksum byte at the end.
Output: * Byte 1 (HC1): high byte of 2 byte homecode * Byte 2 (HC2): low byte of 2 byte homecode * Byte 3 (ADR): address byte * Byte 4 (CMD): command byte, if bit 5 is set, an additional byte follows * Byte 5 (EXT): extension byte
